legacy.full_text: Glad to chair the afternoon session of the High-level Dialogue on #AntiMicrobialResistance! AMR is becoming a global challenge. China🇨🇳 is also delighted to co-sponsor this event to Call To Action.  We need to tackle AMR through solidarity & cooperation at all levels. https://t.co/sBDfNUhDRS

legacy.description: The official twitter account of the Permanent Mission of the People's Republic of China to the United Nations. See also @ChinaAmbUN
legacy.name: Chinese Mission to UN

legacy.full_text: Jointly initiated by China, @Brazil_UN_NY, @indonesiaunny & @RwandaUN , Groups of Friends on Safety & Security of UN Peacekeepers was established today. 49 members including T/PCCs, FCCs & host states joined the group. https://t.co/7HbnetlyUr

Glad to launch with 🇧🇷🇮🇩🇷🇼the Group of Friends on the Safety and Security of UN Peacekeepers! Thank you to all the 49 members that have joined the group. Blue helmets are valuable assets for peace. China will continue to work with all partners to improve their safety & security.

legacy.full_text: This year, China will host the biodiversity COP15 in Kunming and London is to hold the climate change COP26.Tackling environmental challenges is an important area that the UK and China are keen to work on together which will benefit the whole world for generations to come. https://t.co/VC5Bz43ngu

legacy.full_text: WHO experts’ advice based on scientific & professional study merits attention. COVID19 is still taking lives. legacy.full_text:
I asked both Chinese State Councilor and Foreign Minister Wang Yi and Russian Foreign Minister Lavrov about their view on so-called "vaccine diplomacy". Wang Yi said  unlike some countries who are hoarding the vaccines for their own interests, 
we want more people immunised. "
